item.description:
Please join your fellow Southerner's for a come when you wish extended happy hour!!!

It's been awhile since the last meetup so I thought I would keep this one casual and relaxed. I'll be at the Beantown Pub on Tremont Street starting around 5pm and stay until 9:15 to meet as many Southerner's as possible! Feel free to drop by anytime, stay the whole time or only for a while, eat if you'd like and have a beer . . . or a few! As usual, I'll be on the look out for new members and will have a sign so you can easily identify the group.

I look forward to seeing y'all there!
item.name: Happy Hour!
